item.description:
We've been to Cafe Momo before and it's a great place to go for both unique cuisine and a very intimate setting (they only have two rooms). So, come join us for a very light book and delicious Nepalese dishes. Try the Mojitos while you're there. They are spectacular!!

12 person cap applies as usual and remember to update your RSVP if it turns out you won't be able to make it.

Hope to see you there!
item.why: What else are you going to do on a Wednesday night? Besides, his books are really funny. So, if you're looking to read some "mind candy" as we get closer to summer, then come on over.

group.name: The Southern NH Books and Brew Club

item.name: Discuss Practical Demonkeeping by Christopher Moore
